alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Logan; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:02PM CDT until June 25 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Logan County in western Arkansas... Southern Johnson County in western Arkansas... North central Yell County in central Arkansas... West central Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 702 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spadra, or over Clarksville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Lamar... London... Knoxville... Hartman... Scranton... Woodland... Hinkle... Mt Nebo State Park... Hoyt... Lake Dardanelle... Spadra... Tokalon... Holman... Coal Hill... Morrison Bluff... Lutherville... Dublin... Ludwig... Piney Bay Recreation Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
